Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the New York Preventing Revocation of Organizations' Tax-Exempt Classifications by Trump Act (NY-PROTECT ACT); repealer
Summary: Allows an organization included on the federal list of tax-exempt organizations under section 501(c)(3) of title 26 of the United States code on March first, two thousand twenty-five to automatically maintain their tax-exempt status for New York state purposes; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to enacting the "New York Preventing Revocation of Organizations' Tax-Exempt Classifications by Trump Act" or the "NY-PROTECT ACT"; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
